page.title: 04MAIN FEATURES,ASTWOOD BANK
page.content: Astwood Bank has two schools in it. Most children attend them.It also has three churches.Another main feature is the Saltway.You can't see it because the village is built on top of it.An important feature which everyone can see is the war memorial.It is placed outside the post office in Evesham Road.The war memorial is in rememberence of all the people who lived,or were known,in Astwood Bank and were killed or injured in the World Wars.There are 5 public houses situated in various parts of Astwood Bank,but none of them are placed near one another.Most of the public houses are visited by regular customers,and the churches are attended on Sundays. They also provide activities for the children.
